#############################################
intra-class-rare-learn Documentation
#############################################

**Date**: |today| **Version**: |version|

**Useful links**:
`Source Repository <https://github.com/jannewer/intra-class-rare-learn>`__

This is the documentation for the `intra-class-rare-learn` package. The package
provides sklearn-compatible estimators that are built to handle within-class rarity.
